stories.text:
We're building software for enterprise customers and usually as a requirement they want some sort of audit trails.

Been doing a lot of reading into best practices (e.g. Enterprise Ready audit-log) [1] but love to hear everyone else's thoughts on how they've implemented audit logging in there software (e.g. strategies / gotchas, performance bottlenecks, rollbacks etc.)

[1] https://www.enterpriseready.io/features/audit-log/
stories.title: Ask HN: How have you implemented audit trails for enterprise software?

stories.text: I can't find a way to get darkmode on chromebook/guest mode. (Night light doesn't cut it - still too bright)  I found a link to dark mode CSS but no easy way to use it without some hacking.  IS there an easy way yet?
stories.title: How can I use darkmode on Chromebook for HN?
